reviews.review_msg: For her first time teaching the course, I'd say she has done a fantastic job. She tried hard to make the class interesting and engaging, even sometimes can be boring since material is a bit dry to me. Her lectures are short and concise, yet very clear. He exams are straight forward and pretty easy, and her take home final is not bad either.

Great teacher, i think shes newish. Can listen to her lectures online, gives great short lectures. She doesn't make you want to kill yourself for having to sit through 3 hours of monotonous material. Makes everything sound interesting! Just make sure you take notes!!!
